directions: Heat olive oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat. Stir in garlic and chile pepper; cook for 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Stir in broccoli; cook 1 minute. Add kale, and cook 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Stir in sun-dried tomatoes. Pour in lime juice, and season with salt to taste. Toss well.
ingredients: 1 bunch kale, stems removed and chopped
1/4 cup sun-dried tomatoes, cut in thin strips
title: Stir-Fried Kale and Broccoli Florets
